The word "game" is used metaphorically to describe a situation where a new economic hegemony is being developed.\n\nBased on this analysis, the most suitable meaning of the ambiguous word "game" is an Breath (sense_number: 2)\n4. Empty rhetoric or insincere or exaggerated talk (sense_number: 3)\n5. An indication of potential opportunity (sense_number: 4)\n6.
